#Text=Wikinews interviews Australian Paralympic wheelchair basketballer Shelley
#Text=Chaplin
#Text=This article mentions the Wikimedia Foundation , one of its projects , or people related to it .
#Text=Wikinews is a project of the Wikimedia Foundation .
#Text=Friday , January 4 , 2013
#Text=Listen to this interview .
#Text=Recently , Wikinews spent time with with Australian Paralympic wheelchair basketballer Shelley Chaplin .
#Text=( ( Wikinews ) ) Interview with Shelley Chaplin .
#Text=First of all , what position do you play ?
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : Usually a point guard .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Right .
#Text=And whenever I go to see the basketball in Canberra , we pass by a glass case .
#Text=In the case is a guernsey with number twelve on it , and a big sign that says that this was the guernsey worn by Shelley Chaplin ...
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : That 's me !
#Text=That 's my ...
#Text=( ( WN ) ) It 's signed by the rest of the team , if you look — press your nose to the glass and look really close .
#Text=How did that come to be there ?
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : It 's actually the singlet that I wore in Beijing .
#Text=Usually you get people to sign stuff .
#Text=Anyway , the AIS just asked everybody if we would donate something [ ... ] .
#Text=I was n't using it so , yeah , I gave them that .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) Oh okay .
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : I do n't think they have it ...
#Text=It 's been there for a while now .
#Text=It think that was a four year loan or something like that .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) I think it 's been there for longer than that .
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : It 's been there for longer than that .
#Text=Or — it must be four years around about now .
#Text=Went in just after Beijing .
#Text=( ( WN ) )
#Text=So they 'll return that to you ?
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : They 'll return it at some point .
#Text=I mean , I like it .
#Text=It 's nice to have it there .
#Text=It 's good that they have some stuff from wheelchair basketball there , and I do n't need it , so , yeah .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) How did you get into playing wheelchair basketball ?
#Text=Shelley Chaplin : After the Atlanta Paralympics actually .
#Text=There was a welcome home parade in Melbourne .
#Text=So I never knew anything about wheelchair sports before that .

#Text=And I went to the parade , and I used to walk around , but that day I used a wheelchair because I was really tired , and someone just approached me and said " Hey , do you know anything about wheelchair sports ?

#Text= And , yeah , so I did ! I tried everything , and I liked basketball the most .
